the object could not be sent on the SWB
used when an inline switch is executed

sectiondef.header: constants for config parameters for which TIME to use

briefdescription.para: the number of Absolute Time Sequences

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Implements the Noop command that insures the SC app is alive

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_SC_CMDPC - command counter will increment
The SC_NOOP_INF_EID informational event message will be generated when the command is received

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Resets the SC housekeeping counters

$sc_$cpu_SC_CMDPC - command counter will be cleared
The SC_STARTATS_CMD_INF_EID informational event message will be generated when the command is received

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected
ATP is not idle
ATS specified is not loaded
Invalid ATS ID
All command were skipped

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Starts the specified RTS

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_SC_CMDPC - command counter will increment
The SC_STARTRTS_CMD_DBG_EID will be sent

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected
Invalid command field in first RTS command
RTS not loaded
RTS already running
RTS is disabled
Invalid RTS ID

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:

listitem.para: \ $sc_$cpu_SC_RTSACTEC - RTS activate error counter will increment

simplesect.title: Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description

Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:

xrefdescription.para: Jump the time in the running ATS

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Moves the 'current time' pointer in the ATS to another time

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_SC_CMDPC - command counter will increment
The SC_JUMP_ATS_INF_EID will be sent

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected
All ATS Cmds were skipped in the jump, ATS is shut off
No ATS is active

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Sets the flag which specifies whether or not to continue processing an ATS if one of the commands in the ATS fails checksum validation before being sent out.

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_SC_CMDPC - command counter will increment
The SC_CONT_CMD_DEB_EID will be sent

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected
Invalid State specified

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Adds contents of the Append table to the specified ATS table

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_SC_CMDPC - command counter will increment

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected
ATS specified is not loaded
Invalid ATS ID
Append table contents too large to fit in ATS free space

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

xrefdescription.para: Request from cFE Table Services to manage a table

detaileddescription.para:
Description
This command signals a need for the host application (SC) to allow cFE Table Services to manage the specified table. For loadable tables, this command indicates that a table update is available. For dump only tables, this command indicates that cFE Table Services wants to dump the table data. In either case, the host application must call the table manage API function so that the pending function can be executed within the context of the host. Note: There is no reason for this command to be sent from any source other than cFE Table Services.

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified via:
cFE Table Services housekeeping telemetry

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Invalid table ID
Unexpected result during manage of loadable table

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure for this command may be verified via:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: The load state for an RTS may be LOADED or NOT LOADED. The enable state for an RTS may be ENABLED or DISABLED. The run state for an RTS may be STARTED or STOPPED. This command STARTS each RTS in the specified group that is currently LOADED, ENABLED and STOPPED.

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_SC_CMDPC - command counter will increment
SC_STARTRTSGRP_CMD_INF_EID event will indicate the number of RTS in the group that were actually STARTED by the command.

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected
Invalid group definition, first RTS ID must be 1 through SC_NUMBER_OF_RTS
Invalid group definition, last RTS ID must be 1 through SC_NUMBER_OF_RTS
Invalid group definition, last RTS ID must be greater than or equal to first RTS ID
If the group definition is valid the command will report success, regardless of whether any RTS in the group is actually STARTED by the command.

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:

listitem.para: The SC_LEN_ERR_EID event will indicate invalid command packet length.
The SC_STARTRTSGRP_CMD_ERR_EID event will indicate invalid group definition.

simplesect.title: Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: The load state for an RTS may be LOADED or NOT LOADED. The enable state for an RTS may be ENABLED or DISABLED. The run state for an RTS may be STARTED or STOPPED. This command STOPS each RTS in the specified group that is currently STARTED.

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_SC_CMDPC - command counter will increment
The SC_STOPRTSGRP_CMD_INF_EID event will indicate the number of RTS in the group that were actually STOPPED by the command

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected
Invalid group definition, first RTS ID must be 1 through SC_NUMBER_OF_RTS
Invalid group definition, last RTS ID must be 1 through SC_NUMBER_OF_RTS
Invalid group definition, last RTS ID must be greater than or equal to first RTS ID
If the group definition is valid the command will report success, regardless of whether any RTS in the group is actually STOPPED by the command.

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:

listitem.para: The SC_LEN_ERR_EID event will indicate invalid command packet length.
The SC_STOPRTSGRP_CMD_ERR_EID event will indicate invalid group definition.

simplesect.title: Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: The enable state for an RTS may be ENABLED or DISABLED. This command sets the enable state for the specified group of RTS to DISABLED.

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_SC_CMDPC - command counter will increment
The SC_DISRTSGRP_CMD_INF_EID event will indicate the number of RTS in the group that were changed from ENABLED to DISABLED by the command

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected
Invalid group definition, first RTS ID must be 1 through SC_NUMBER_OF_RTS
Invalid group definition, last RTS ID must be 1 through SC_NUMBER_OF_RTS
Invalid group definition, last RTS ID must be greater than or equal to first RTS ID
If the group definition is valid the command will report success, regardless of whether the group contained an RTS that was not already DISABLED.

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:

listitem.para: The SC_LEN_ERR_EID event will indicate invalid command packet length.
The SC_DISRTSGRP_CMD_ERR_EID event will indicate invalid group definition.

simplesect.title: Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: The enable state for an RTS may be ENABLED or DISABLED. This command sets the enable state for the specified group of RTS to ENABLED.

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_SC_CMDPC - command counter will increment
The SC_ENARTSGRP_CMD_INF_EID event will indicate success and display the number of RTS that were changed from DISABLED to ENABLED by the command.

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected
Invalid group definition, first RTS ID must be 1 through SC_NUMBER_OF_RTS
Invalid group definition, last RTS ID must be 1 through SC_NUMBER_OF_RTS
Invalid group definition, last RTS ID must be greater than or equal to first RTS ID
If the group definition is valid the command will report success, regardless of whether the group contained an RTS that was not already ENABLED.

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:

listitem.para: The SC_LEN_ERR_EID event will indicate invalid command packet length.
The SC_ENARTSGRP_CMD_ERR_EID event will indicate invalid group definition.

simplesect.title: Criticality
simplesect.para: None
